Content.Text:
Excuse me, <MYNAME>, are you awake?
May I have a word?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.
I have something very important to talk
to you about.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>...
How would you like to work with me to
revitalize this town?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The things you've been doing over the
past month or so have made me think
seriously about restoring this town.
<PAGE>
But I couldn't come up with any specific
ideas until you blazed a trail.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
When you built that house for Rebecca,
I was truly amazed by your skills...
<PAGE>
There's no doubt about it! You're a
genius at making things! It would be
foolish not to make use of your talents!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a revitalization plan that the
people of our town came up with.
We call it the "Town Restoration"!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you can implement the things written
in this plan, the town will certainly
recover its old vitality!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I have watched many people
move out of this town.
<PAGE>
I can't bear any more sad farewells like
that!
<PAGE>
I'm happy that over the past month, our
population has increased slightly. We
have momentum! I don't want to waste it!
<PAGE>
I want you and all the other newcomers
in town to feel glad they came here!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
For the town restoration to happen,
I need your help!
<PAGE>
I'm counting on you, <MYNAME>!
Here's what needs to be done!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, thank you, <MYNAME>!
I'm so glad to hear you say that!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let me give you the Town Restoration
plan that I mentioned earlier.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What I've given you is the first stage
of the Town Restoration. There are five
stages in all.
<PAGE>
Everything that I'd like you to do is
written in there. Please go over it
later.
<PAGE>
Most of the tasks are placing buildings
and amenities around town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our goal is to draw people who moved
away back to town, and also attract new
residents.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This must seem like a lot of work!
But I'm counting on you!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I'll be going now.
See you later, <MYNAME>.
